name: Shield And A Gun

Controlls

In the game you can SHOOT ENEMIES!!

Movement W, A, S, D and / or  arrow keys.  Shooting Left clickShieldRight Click Pxl Game Jam

This game was made for a game jam, where you have to make a game in 5 hours. The 5-hours contain the actual development, but not the planning. 

I created an asset pack for this jam, you can find it here:

https://pxldev.itch.io/1-bit-fps-pack
